service

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.UserService

  • @Component
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    UserService class provides methods for dealing with User and related History objects.
    Author:
    Aleksandr Gaslov

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        public User createUser(java.lang.String login,
              java.lang.String password)
        Creates new User object with given login and password. Sets default priority '2' for all Card objects for this new User.
        Parameters:
        login - given login (user name)
        password - given password
        Returns:
        new User object with given login and password

      • loadUser

        public User loadUser(java.lang.String login)
        Loads User with given login.
        Parameters:
        login - given login
        Returns:
        loaded User object

        Returns:
        list of existing User objects
